column2:
'file parameter, to create a standalone Spark jo as shown:'
'- -'
'Azure CLI'
'az ml jo create -- file <YAML_SPECIFICATION_FILE_NAME>.yaml'
'--'
'suscription <SUBSCRIPTION_ID> -- resource-group <RESOURCE_GROUP>'
'workspace-name <AML_WORKSPACE_NAME>'
'- -'
'? Tip'
'You might have an existing Synapse Spark pool in your Azure Synapse workspace.'
'To use an existing Synapse Spark pool, please follow the instructions to attach a'
'Synapse Spark pool in Azure Machine Learning workspace.'
'Next steps'
'\xc2\x7 Apache Spark in Azure Machine Learning (preview)'
'.'
'Quickstart: Interactive Data Wrangling with Apache Spark (preview)'
'Attach and manage a Synapse Spark pool in Azure Machine Learning (preview)'
'Interactive Data Wrangling with Apache Spark in Azure Machine Learning (preview)'
